title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 118.6 - Notice of services provided
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 118.6 - Notice of services provided

State Regulations

The school district in which the correctional facility is
located shall notify the department, and the school district identified
pursuant to Education Law, section 3202(7)(b) as being responsible for the
educational costs of such child, that a request for educational services has
been received from the correctional facility on behalf of an incarcerated
youth. Such notice shall be on a form prescribed by the commissioner and shall
be provided within 30 days of initiation of educational
services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
118.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
